summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East 61st Street, from 20th Avenue Northeast to a point 200 feet east of 21st Avenue Northeast; and 21st Avenue Northeast, from East 61st Street to the alley between East 62nd Street and East 63rd Street; all in The City of Seattle; all in accordance with Petition No. 80629 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
